verses.verse: The word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> also came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, thou dwellest <WH3427> in the midst <WH8432> of the rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>, that have eyes <WH5869> to see <WH7200>, and see <WH7200> not <WH241>, that have ears to hear <WH8085>, and hear <WH8085> not <WH4805>; for they are a rebellious house <WH1004>.

Therefore <WH1121>, thou son of man <WH120>, prepare <WH6213> thee stuff <WH3627> for removing <WH1473>, and remove <WH1540> by day <WH3119> in their sight <WH5869>; and thou shalt remove <WH1540> from thy place <WH4725> to another <WH312> place <WH4725> in their sight <WH5869>: it may be they will consider <WH7200>, though they are a rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>.

And thou shalt bring forth <WH3318> thy stuff <WH3627> by day <WH3119> in their sight <WH5869>, as stuff <WH3627> for removing <WH1473>; and thou shalt go forth <WH3318> thyself at even <WH6153> in their sight <WH5869>, as when men go forth <WH4161> into exile <WH1473>.
Dig <WH2864> thou through the wall <WH7023> in their sight <WH5869>, and carry out thereby <WH3318>.

In their sight <WH5869> shalt thou bear <WH5375> it upon thy shoulder <WH3802>, and carry it forth <WH3318> in the dark <WH5939>; thou shalt cover <WH3680> thy face <WH6440>, that thou see <WH7200> not the land <WH776>: for I have set <WH5414> thee for a sign <WH4159> unto the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>.

And I did <WH6213> so as I was commanded <WH6680>: I brought forth <WH3318> my stuff <WH3627> by day <WH3119>, as stuff <WH3627> for removing <WH1473>, and in the even <WH6153> I digged <WH2864> through the wall <WH7023> with my hand <WH3027>; I brought it forth <WH3318> in the dark <WH5939>, and bare <WH5375> it upon my shoulder <WH3802> in their sight <WH5869>.
And in the morning <WH1242> came the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> unto me <WH559>, saying,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, hath not the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, the rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>, said <WH559> unto thee <WH6213>, What doest thou?

Say <WH559> thou unto them <WH559>, Thus saith the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: This burden <WH4853> concerneth the prince <WH5387> in Jerusalem <WH3389>, and all the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> among whom they are <WH8432>.
Say <WH559>, I am your sign <WH4159>: like as I have done <WH6213>, so shall it be done <WH6213> unto them <WH3212>; they shall go into exile <WH1473>, into captivity <WH7628>.

And the prince <WH5387> that is among <WH8432> them shall bear <WH5375> upon his shoulder <WH3802> in the dark <WH5939>, and shall go forth <WH3318>: they shall dig <WH2864> through the wall <WH7023> to carry out <WH3318> thereby <WH3680>: he shall cover his face <WH6440>, because <WH3282> he shall not see <WH7200> the land <WH776> with his eyes <WH5869>.

My net <WH7568> also will I spread <WH6566> upon him <WH8610>, and he shall be taken in my snare <WH4686>; and I will bring <WH935> him to Babylon <WH894> to the land <WH776> of the Chaldeans <WH3778>; yet shall he not see <WH7200> it <WH4191>, though he shall die there.

And I will scatter <WH2219> toward every wind <WH7307> all that are round about <WH5439> him to help <WH5828> him <WH102>, and all his bands; and I will draw out <WH7324> the sword <WH2719> after them <WH310>.
And they shall know <WH3045> that I am Jehovah <WH3068>, when I shall disperse <WH2219> them among the nations <WH1471>, and scatter <WH6327> them through the countries <WH776>.

But I will leave <WH3498> a few <WH4557> men <WH582> of them from the sword <WH2719>, from the famine <WH7458>, and from the pestilence <WH1698>; that they may declare <WH5608> all their abominations <WH8441> among the nations <WH1471> whither they come <WH935>; and they shall know <WH3045> that I am Jehovah <WH3068>.
Moreover the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came to me <WH559>, saying,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, eat <WH398> thy bread <WH3899> with quaking <WH7494>, and drink <WH8354> thy water <WH4325> with trembling <WH7269> and with fearfulness <WH1674>;

and say <WH559> unto the people <WH5971> of the land <WH127>, Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH136> concerning the inhabitants <WH3427> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, and the land <WH776> of Israel <WH3478>: They shall eat <WH398> their bread <WH3899> with fearfulness <WH1674>, and drink <WH8354> their water <WH4325> in dismay <WH8078>, that her land <WH776> may be desolate <WH3456>, and despoiled of all that is therein <WH4393>, because of the violence <WH2555> of all them that dwell therein <WH3427>.
And the cities <WH5892> that are inhabited <WH3427> shall be laid waste <WH2717>, and the land <WH776> shall be a desolation <WH8077>; and ye shall know <WH3045> that I am Jehovah <WH3068>.
And the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, what is this proverb <WH4912> that ye have in the land <WH127> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, The days <WH3117> are prolonged <WH748>, and every vision <WH2377> faileth <WH6>?

Tell <WH559> them therefore <WH559>, Thus saith the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: I will make this proverb <WH4912> to cease <WH7673>, and they shall no more use it as a proverb <WH4911> in Israel <WH3478>; but say <WH1696> unto them <WH3117>, The days are at hand <WH7126>, and the fulfilment <WH1697> of every vision <WH2377>.
For there shall be no more any false <WH7723> vision <WH2377> nor flattering <WH2509> divination <WH4738> within <WH8432> the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>.

For I am Jehovah <WH3068>; I will speak <WH1696>, and the word <WH1697> that I shall speak <WH1696> shall be performed <WH6213>; it shall be no more deferred <WH4900>: for in your days <WH3117>, O rebellious <WH4805> house <WH1004>, will I speak <WH1696> the word <WH1697>, and will perform <WH6213> it <WH5002>, saith the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>.
Again the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came to me <WH559>, saying,

Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, behold <WH1004>, they of the house of Israel <WH3478> say <WH559>, The vision <WH2377> that he seeth <WH2372> is for many <WH7227> day <WH3117> to come <WH5012>, and he prophesieth of times <WH6256> that are far off <WH7350>.

Therefore say <WH559> unto them <WH559>, Thus saith the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: There shall none of my words <WH1697> be deferred <WH4900> any more <WH1697>, but the word which I shall speak <WH1696> shall be performed <WH6213>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>.
